content: Shayan Oveis Gharan's homepage In the name of God Shayan Oveis Gharan Lazowska Professor of Computer Science & Engineering Computer Science and Engineering University of Washington A short bio and my CV I am mainly interested in the design and analysis of algorithms using algebraic techniques. In Spring 2019 I co-organized a semester long program on Geometry of Polynomials. Here is a research vignette about my works on Log-concave polynomials with connections to the Geometry of Polynomials program. Recent/Selected Publications J. Leake, S.
